description: Strategies to help young children open up about tough emotions.
title: How to Talk to a Child Who Is Struggling
title_page: How to Talk to a Child Who Is Struggling - The New York Times
maintext:
How to Talk to a Child Who Is Struggling Christina Caron ��Reporting from New York
Olivier Douliery/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
When a younger child seems to be struggling with depression or anxiety, it can be difficult to talk about it.
Here are some ways to help kids open up about tough emotions →
